name: 180 Seconds (itch)
description:
Game made for the Ludum Dare 39.

House is running out of power, fix every object before the blackout comes in !

WASD or Arrows to move

Left Click to interact

If the oven is activated during 10 seconds, you loose

If the sink is activated during 10 seconds, you loose

If all the lights are off during 10 seconds, you loose

If at the end of the 180 seconds the heat is under 50%, you loose

Else you win !
